name: ZZZZ Flickr - Small Justified (Compact) v.4
description: IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey NEW: I don't like this justified view.... Too big (and too slow)! This Userstyle make it smaller /compact. ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

obsoletion_message:
IMPORTANT (2020):
It should be better to use now (more updated)
▶ My Flickr ALLinONE userstyles.
additional_info: What's does this Userstyles: - (NEW v.4): Reduce the TOP Header (Delete the Cover photo etc... Include "NEW GLOBAL NAVBAR only visble on Hover" - Add Paginator Always visible on the left side... - Rows Counter - Metas Adapted - Color correction Read here my request in Greasemonkey forum about this Damn Justified View: Flickr Thumbnail (30.07.2013) : How to change the JUSTIFED view on to the old way (small etc..) [USO mirror] In addition in it : - Many links related at this JUSTIFIED view. - A copy of the Flickr/yahoo scripts running on the pool (small view) page before their last change of 29.07.2013 IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewers) - DACKR Viewer ► Flickr WideScreen (Viewer) - FFFLCKR (fffflckr) ▶ You Can Find Many Other Updated Infos About Flickr Extensions / Userscripts / Userstyles / Applications.. In : ► My BIG List (After New Photo Page Design (2015) - Updated. ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus( Firefox Addon) Very Good addon to use on many sites too.
